38830344.review: The Enigmatis games were the first HOGs that I played and pretty much define what I'm looking for in a HOG. Great graphics, great story. 180+ games in my library, and this series is still one of my favorites.

38812914.review:
This was my favorite in the series, I just liked the whole spooky amusement park thing lol.  I'm a big fan of the horror genre in general so it was nice to get a little taste of it in this game.  I missed an illusion early on so I'm pissed that I didn't get that achievement... one off... oh well.  Other than that, which was my fault anyway lol, I loved this installment of the series.  I've reviewed every game in the series because I like them THAT MUCH!! :D  

The games are definitely worth it, and knowing what I know I wouldn't have minded paying full price for them, but I got them on sale, and feel oh so good about that :D.

Game is compelling, story is incredibly innovative, and interesting, and UI is easy to manage.  I've read others complain about voice acting, and while it's not my favorite, I did play all three Gabriel Knight games back in the day (even named my son after him), and if I can listen to him rattle on I can pretty much listen to anyone :D.

38734034.review: I liked the additional types of puzzles that weren't offered in the first game. I also liked the option to do a card match game instead of the hidden object. I also liked the general storyline and scenes better; very lush and pretty.

36640564.review:
1편보다 발전된 2편입니다.
HOS에서 조합식이 나온것도 특이하고 일단 스토리가 있습니다. 그게 제일 중요한 사실이지요.

물론 아침 드라마마냥 예상가는게 있는데 주인공인 탐정님이
너무 심증을 믿지 않은 빼박 경찰이라서 물증만 따지다가 관광 당하는 경우가 있습니다 아 답답

여전히 성우들은 차분하고 착한 목소리가 가득합니다 에버랜드 네버랜드 수준입니다

그 와중에 꼬맹이는 자기가 심각한 상황인데도
회사가 3D를 웃는걸로 디폴트 해놓았는지
내가 잡혀있는 와중에도 웃으면서 말을 하는데
잡혀있는 중에 저 웃는 얼굴로 괜찮으세요?
하는데 비웃음이 가득하게 보이는게 단점입니다
나쁜녀석 내가 너 구하다가 이렇게 됐다.

한글화가 안되어있는게 평가란을 보면 '한글화 좀 ㅠ'하는
한글화 빌런들이 있어서 큰 문제가 될 줄 알았는데 어렵지도 않습니다.
이 정도 영어 수준으로 한글화 안되어있어요 우엥 하는 사람들은
대충 분위기로 스토리를 읽도록 합시다.

자아아랑스러운 우릐의 떄한민꾺은 영어 교육을 많이 시켰지만
영단어로 끌개나 막대기와 지팡이같은 생활 물건 단어는 가르친 적이 많이 없으므로
헷갈린다면 영어단어 사전을 켜놓고 하는게 도움은 되겠지요.
단어가 한글로 보인다고 물건이 바로 찾아지는건 아니겠지만요..

전 이제 3편을 하러 갑니다 후후

36561164.review:
Jedna z lepszych gier typu HOPA. 

Praktycznie nic teraz nie kojarzę żeby mnie raziło; sceny z ukrytymi przedmiotami które w najnowszych grach Artifexa mnie męczą tutaj (raczej) nie mają żadnych przedobrzonych "ukrywajek", łamigłówki też są w sam raz, fabuła całkiem dobra, choć twist fabularny w końcowym etapie możliwy do przewidzenia, ogólna narracja jest solidna, udało się zbudować trochę klimatu.

Strona audio-wizualna jak to w grach zrobionych bezpośrednio przez Artifex co najmniej przyzwoita.

Na pewno gra lepsza od części pierwszej, która swoją drogą też nie była kiepska.

36541401.review: Very entertaining mystery game!  If you're looking for something with an enthralling story that will make you think rather than rely on reflexes, this is the game for you!  I highly recommend getting the collection with both sequels, it's well worth the money!

36407651.review: In termini di puro racconto, di atmosfere, di ritmo della narrativa, Enigmatis anche con questo episodio si conferma tra le saghe più interessanti tra i titoli di Artifex. Manca la lingua italiana, ma il game è comunque sufficientemente giocabile utilizzando una delle lingue che vi sono più “affini” (io ho usato lo spagnolo). Ci troviamo davanti a vicende al limite tra l’esoterico e il religioso e, dal punto della giocabilità, è da apprezzare l’ottima cura nei dettagli a partire dalle scene con oggetti nascosti, mentre purtroppo la varietà dei mini-giochi non è altissima: molti si basano sul movimento contemporaneo di più elementi. Altro fattore negativo è la presenza di una mappa non molto dettagliata, che costringe a ricorrere all’aiuto per capire dove occorre andare. E' davvero un peccato che non sia anche in lingua italiana… per lo sviluppatore un'occasione persa per ampliare il numero degli acquirenti! Ovviamente, consigliato solo se lo trovate ad un prezzo scontato.

36200786.review: Plus joli que le premier, avec une navigation bien plus fluide (carte, preuves, etc...), le jeu est magnifique. Il prends place dans une foret de pins, "à l'américaine", c'est à la fois très mystérieux, très lumineux, coloré .. . Beaucoup de choses à faire/à voir, des scènes d'objets cachés pas trop compliquées (de même que les énigmes), et des choses à chercher en "bonus" (papillons, objets illusoires...) L'histoire est la suite du 1er, mais elles peuvent être jouer indépendamment (on reprends les mêmes personnages, et la même "trame".) Très émouvant par moments ! Une série à adopter !

36155687.review:
Great game. Pretty much all of my complaints from the first game have been improved upon with this title. The voice acting is tolerable, the animagtion has made great strides, there is much less back and forth, and the story is more rich. The only change I dislike is that there were far fewer hidden object scenes in this title, which are the best part in my opinion. But overall, this was a great game and well worth the money on sale.

8/10

36056417.review:
A nice game.

Actually, I am not big fan of games this genre. Actually, I don't play them at all. I suppose the last game in the hidden object genre was 10 years ago. But I saw this game on the sale, looked at the rating and bought it. later when i had free time i installed it. So, there is my little review.

First of all, I want to say that the graphics and animations are really nice. This game has a lot of enjoyable views. The story is nothing great, but it's good. There are no so much text, so you won't getting bored reading them. Puzzles are average, not hard, not simple. I liked a hidden object part of the game. This game gameplay is great for English learners because they will meet a lot usual in the common life but not used in schoolbooks. It is also great that you always can use hint if you are tired of searching.

I passed about 80% of the game and saw in YouTube the last scenes. So, I almost passed it :D
Actually, it's a good rating because I am hardcore player and usually don't play casual games

I see this game often, so buy it you will see it on a sale. Actually, I can even recommend it for a full price.

36014811.review:
เกมหาของเล่าเรื่องของนักสืบสาวที่คราวนี้ต้องมาไล่ตามหาบาทหลวงที่ก่อเรื่องเมื่อภาคก่อน แต่แทนที่จะได้สืบหาเลย...ดันมาเจอเหตุการณ์คนหายอย่างมีเงื่อนงำของRavenwood และเมื่อสืบให้ลึกขึ้น...ป่าแห่งนี้กลับยิ่งมีความลึกลับขึ้นเรื่อยๆ ทั้งเรื่องปีศาจอีกา ภาพลวงตา และเวทย์มนต์ต่างๆ ซึ่ง...สปอยได้แค่นี้ค่ะ เดี๋ยวหมดสนุก orz... เพราะเนื้อเรื่องยังคงทำให้คิดว่าทำไมทุกคนฉลาดหมดยกเว้นนางเอกเช่นเคย

ข้อดีของเกมนี้
1. ยังคงมีความเป็นเกมหาของ point-click ที่เล่นได้ง่ายเหมือนภาคก่อนค่ะ และยังคงมีความวนสถานที่ แต่ไม่ได้หนักหนาเท่าภาคแรก
2. เมื่อเทียบกับภาคแรกนะคะ... ภาพยอมรับเลยว่ามีความสวยงามขึ้นค่ะ โดยเฉพาะแม่หนูBeckyน่ารักมาก 55555+ puzzleโดยรวมค่อนข้างดีขึ้นแล้วค่ะ อาจเป็นเพราะเราเก็ตตรรกะเกมมากขึ้นก็เลยรู้สึกว่าเก็ตที่จะทำสิ่งใดต่อมากขึ้นค่ะ มีเพิ่มตัวช่วยเป็นเกมจับคู่ในตอนหาของ แต่ตอนหาของบางอย่างต้องมีการผสมไอเทมด้วย แทนที่จะเจอง่ายๆเลยกลายเป็นอะไรของมันนะ puzzleบางอันจะเป็นแนวที่เราก็ต้องแก้วนๆทั้งๆที่รู้แล้วนะว่าแก้ยังไง เลยรู้สึกเป็นการดึงเวลาและน่ารำคาญขึ้นเล็กๆ
3. เพลงและเสียงยังคงทำได้ดีเช่นเคยแต่อยู่ในเกณฑ์มาตรฐาน ตัวละครมีเสียงพากษ์ มี subtitle ให้อ่านเหมือนภาคก่อน
4. ว่าด้วยเรื่องราคาต่อชม. ขอขอบคุณสปอนเซอร์ผู้แอบกดก่อนเลยละกัน เพื่อนเราเอง...มุกเหมียว ได้กดมาให้เราเล่นในราคาที่เจ้าตัวไม่ยอมบอก 555555+ เราเลยขอประเมินแบบปัดไปในเกณฑ์ราคาเดียวกับภาคที่แล้ว เกมมีการ์ด, Acheivement และแอบมีโบนัสสั้นๆแถมเช่นเคย แต่เราไม่ถึงกับว้าวมากเพราะไม่ค่อยถูกใจส่วนเนื้อเรื่องและpuzzleที่ดึงเวลาขึ้นนัก แต่ทั้งหมดก็น่าจะเป็นไปตามมาตรฐานเกมส์หาของนะ ถ้าอยากกดจริงๆกดตอนลดหนักมากๆ หรือลงบันเดิ้ลเถอะ 

ข้อเสียของเกมนี้
1. ว่าด้วยเนื้อเรื่อง...นางเอกยังคงเก่งทุกอย่างยกเว้นทันคนอื่นและโชคดีเกินไปเช่นเคย เนื้อเรื่องที่ควรหักมุมก็ดันเป็นสิ่งที่เราระแคะระคายมาตั้งแต่ต้น เลยรู้สึกว่าเนื้อเรื่องไม่ค่อยโอเค แต่ก็มีเหตุมีผลขึ้นแล้วนะคะ

35963386.review: bon jeu dans l'ensemble avec de superbes graphismes 2D ( 3D un peu moins mais tout a fait convenable ) avec des énigmes a la portée de tous.

35885230.review:
This is the second part of the Engimatis trilogy. In it, the same detective as the first episode gets pulled into another supernatural set of killings. This time on the other side of the country. And within this game, more of the hidden history behind all the darkness comes to light. Probably leading up to the last chapter, where it will all come to a climax.

The minigames are fun, the plot engaging, and the HO scenes are interesting. Also, there is an option to replace some of the HO scenes with a matching game. Which means you must make two playthroughs if you want to get all the achievements. Well, at least two, considering some of the achievements are speed related...

Well worth the price.

35627909.review: Vastly superior to the first mediocre title in the franchise. Enigmatis 2 features much stronger voice acting, interesting puzzles, beautiful scenery, and a compelling, thorough plot. The best part is that you don't need to have played the first title in order to understand the characters and the story (trust me, you should never play the original Enigmatis). The game is honestly great!

35563575.review:
Pros: Much better than the first. Great artwork, interesting puzzles, fairly large world.

Cons: The little girl's whiny voice was obnoxious. Dialogue was very repetitive at times.

35487052.review:
It’s another solid, beautifully drawn, story-based, hidden-object/puzzle game by Artifex Mundi. If any of the words in that description peak your interest, you will probably enjoy this game. Also, even if you did not play the first Enigmatis; you can still follow along with the story just fine.

My only frustration with the game, as with the first one, is sometimes I didn’t understand what the hidden object was, based on the word used for it (like stein = ball of yarn). Granted, that probably just speaks volumes about my vocabulary. However, they do offer an alternative pair matching mode you can use to complete (or do) all hidden-object puzzles.

35472660.review:
海外産のよくあるポイント＆クリック＋アイテム探しゲーム、エニグマティスシリーズ全3作のうちの2作目です
筆者のプレイ順は3→1→2でしたが、この二作目を最大限に楽しむ為には1作目を飛ばして2→1→3とプレイされることを推奨します（ネタバレになるので理由は控えます）

1作目はゲームの作りが甘くほとんどアイテム探しゲームで構成されており、ストーリーを追わなくても大丈夫という方なら2作目→3作目だけで良いかもしれません

このように1作目は事の起こりを知る程度に留まる内容に対して、2作目、3作目は1作目と打って変わって非常に作り込まれており、これまでに数々のポイント＆クリックゲームをプレイしてきましたが、その中でも群を抜いて良質なポイント＆クリックゲームです

道中数々の手がかりを集め、フェルミ推定をして謎を解き明かしていく構成でぐいぐい引き込まれていきます
アイテム探しやミニゲーム、謎解きの品質は3作目を超えられませんが他の類似品と比べれば良質なものとなっていてポイント＆クリックゲーム好きにはもちろんのこと、そうでない方へもお勧めできる完成度の高いゲームでした

もう一度言いますが2作目を最大限に楽しむためには1作目を飛ばしてこの2作目を先にプレイして下さい

演出の出来が良く、ムービーに関してはArtifex Mundiの作品の中でも一番気合入ってるんじゃないでしょうか。
ここのゲームはいつも終盤駆け足気味なんですが、本作は終盤まできっちり作ってあります。
メインのアイテム探し以外も工夫が凝らしてあって飽きさせにくい作り。極端に意地悪なパズルなどもなく、わりとテンポよく進めれる印象。
ストーリーは結構単純なんですけど、雰囲気やキャラクターのよさで引っ張ってくれます。

続き物なので前作はプレイしておいたほうがいいかも。前作もかなり面白いです。

34820613.review:
Enigmatis 2 is the continuation of the Enigmatis series, and this time it takes us to Ravenwood where mysterious kidnappings have found places. Also the "bad guy" from the last game might reside there. Our detective gets to the location of Ravenwood and really weird things start to happen.

The game is pretty well made, and even though it's pretty straight forward how to things, you still need to scratch your head or backtrack alot to get to your goal.

The music and graphic is as always pretty good, and even though it's a point and click game in a forest (which I don't think is so unique), the many locations in the game makes it pretty interesting.

All though the game and history is alright, I still liked the first one better. It had a more creepy atmosphere, and was a bit dark. This one is dark in it's own way, but the protagonist doesn't seem convincing enough to me.

For the lover of hidden object games, this is a real gem. The second in a trilogy, the Mists of Ravenwood finds the you following clues across country to a mystical park known as Ravenwood. The park at times seems to be beautiful and functioning park but something is wrong. You find a young girl that claims her parents were taken by a monster.

As you play through the level, the beautiful appearance of the park simetimes fades to show a rundown and abandoned one in it's place. 

The story is intriguing. While Mists of Ravenwood falls to the same short comings of all hidden object games (puzzels for the sake of puzzels wether they make sense or not), it is still an engaging and entertaining game and deserves a play through or 2.

Przygoda w tajemniczym parku. 

Na Enigmatis 2 trafiłam przypadkiem.  Demo było dostępne na moim służbowym Mac'u i zaczęłam z ciekawości grać. Odkąd tylko włączyłam grę, po prostu zakochałam się w atmosferze i klimacie. Znakomita ścieżka dźwiękowa doskonale pozwoliła wczuć sie w rolę pani detektyw chodzącej po parku iluzji. 

To był mój pierwszy kontakt z grą typy ukryte obiety i przygodową i zakochałam się tak w dziełach Artiflex jak i w gatunku. Jeśli nigdy nie graliście w przygodowe gry, ten gatunek jest dla was. I nie ma powodów do obaw, bowiem system wskazówek nie pozwoli wam się zaciąć. 

I teraz wisienka na torcie: to  polska gra więc tym bardziej warto zagrać. Polscy producenci naprawde wypuszczają perełki a Enigmatis 2 to jedna z nich.

33034531.review:
Если бы мне сказали составить топ 3 игры от Artifex Mundi, то эта игра точно попала бы в него без всяких сомнений.

Сама игра является прямым продолжением предыдущей части серии. Главная героиня, знакомые персонажи и прочее, и прочее, и прочее... Мы всё ещё охотимся за священником и пытаемся разобраться до конца во всех загадках, которые снова всплывают перед нами. 
Игровой процесс был улучшен в разы. Теперь управлять стало намного удобнее, относительно всех геймплейных моментов, куда не посмотри! 
Графика и саундтрек остались, примерно, на том же уровне, чего не скажешь об атмосфере. Она стала намного глубже и загадочней. Ты с трудом отрываешься от игры, и это очень хорошо. Не часто встречаются подобные квесты.
Сюжет тут намного разумнее и понятнее, чем в предшественнике. Очень интересная и запутанная история, которая постепенно будет проясняться по мере прохождения.

Есть ещё DLC, которое, в отличие от того, что было в первой части серии, является большим флешбеком в сиквеле. Мейн лайн продолжается, и один из персонажей второго плана начинает рассказывать историю, которую придётся пережить Вам её глазами. Но оно, к сожалению, получилось немного затянуто и скучновато, хотя сюжет поддерживает интерес к игре.

Игра получилось просто великолепной и оставила несколько намёков на продолжение. Основная история получилась без минусов, на мой взгляд. Она очень порадровала меня и я настоятельно рекомендую сыграть в неё всем любителям жанра. 

10 "я люблю птиц" из 10.
Спасибо за внимание.

31676147.review:
[i]October, 2013 review - Steam version not yet played[/i]

This game takes place two years after the events of the first game at Maple Creek.  It is not necessary to play the first game, but I highly recommend it.  After all, [i]Maple Creek[/i] was really a good game, and you'll understand the background and implications of events in this game much better if you play MC first.

There are three difficulty settings to choose from: Casual, Advanced, and Expert.  The differences are clearly explained.  For example in Expert mode, "Text tips give less direct hints."   The tutorial is optional.

There are separate sliders for Music and Sound, and we can change the difficulty level at any time via our options menu (thanks devs!)  We can also turn off the voice over, custom cursor, and full screen.  Widescreen is automatically supported, and it looks great!

Whilst playing the game, be on the lookout for "Ethereal butterflies."  These have a bluish glow to them.  Also look for "Illusive Objects," which are morphing items.  There are 30 of each to find, so plenty of fun for those of us who like hunting for these extra goodies.  

There are achievements, and you can see what you need to aim for by entering the Achievements area via your options menu.  There is also a Help button in the options menu, and this gives ten pages of illustrated, clear instructions for those not familiar with this kind of game, and/or with the evidence board element we have in the Enigmatis games.

You will see a cutscene as you load the game, and a second one when you start to play the actual game.  The loading-game video is gorgeous, but if you're scared of rats, you might want to skip this one... or close your eyes when you hear squeaking, and wait to open them until it stops. ;D  The initial video (while the game is loading) is not necessary to understand the story -- It just gives you some information about what happened a few minutes before you arrive on the scene.

Your journal has three tabs:  Objectives, Notes, and Illusive Objects.  The first two tabs are pretty useless, at least for me.  There's no extra story in there, and the objectives are pretty clear. The illusive objects are pretty easy to find... for the most part! That's where the journal gets useful.  It tracks how many of the objects you've found, what they looked like, and the order in which they [i]should [/i]be found.  If you see a '?' with objects that you've found all around it, you know that you missed an object in that specific area.

That brings me to the map, which is next to your journal.  It IS a jump-to map, but you jump to an AREA, not specific locations.  The map will show you which areas are "active" (only in Casual and Advanced mode) but of course you don't know exactly which scene in that area needs to have an action taken.

Never fear, though.  Your HINT button gives a directional arrow, should you need it.

The hidden object scenes vary.  We have highly interactive scenes that are more like puzzles, interactive fragmented object scenes, and the more traditional HO scenes with lists of items to find.  Most of the traditional HO's are lightly interactive, with items listed in purple needing an extra step or two.  On the list-type HOS, you can press the Notes button to play a matching game, instead of finding objects.  The matching game isn't your typical card game setup; it's literally written notes that are scattered about.  Matching requires finding a related picture, ie. a notepad would match with a pencil.

The devs did an exceptional job with story in this one, using multiple methods to progress the story.  First off we have the cutscenes, which are absolutely gorgeous.  I was VERY happy to see that I could go back and re-watch these scenes once I finished the game -- there were two in particular that were beautifully directed and "filmed," and I really wanted to see them again.  Next we have story sequences that we gain as we find and place lock pieces on a particular door.  There are 12 of these story pieces, and all but the last can be rewatched at any time during the game (but not once the game is completed) by clicking on the piece(s) you've placed.  Lastly we have our Evidence Board.

What Evidence Board, you ask? The Evidence Board is an inspired addition to gameplay which is only present in the Enigmatis games (as far as I know!)  As we play the game, we gather evidence.  That's nothing new, we do that in a lot of these games!  What's new is that we literally have a board where we can organize the evidence, and as we do, we come to conclusions that progress the story.

The whole game is voiced-over, and beautifully done.  Two voices in particular gave me chills:
[spoiler]The ticket lady (after our first encounter with her), and of course the mysterious man behind the locked door.[/spoiler]
The story is engaging, and the whole game entirely immersive.  This is truly a creepy experience, and I have to say that it's one of the scariest storylines I've seen in a casual game.

It IS a scary game, but the devs injected some humor... Woohoo~!!  A Monty Python reference!  *[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mL7n5mEmXJo]starts whistling the lumberjack song[/url]* :whistle: (added a link so no one would miss the joke!) hehehe

[b]Collector's Edition[/b] extras:
* Integrated Strategy Guide
* Bonus Chapter
* 35 Achievements
* 10 Wallpapers in three different resolutions
* 8 Concept Art
* Downloadable soundtrack - six tracks
* The ability to replay 7 hidden object puzzles
* 15 replayable cutscenes 
* 10-page Redwood Encyclopedia (very cool!)

To play the [b]Bonus Chapter[/b], simply click on the Play button on the main menu -- you can now choose between replaying the main game, or playing the bonus chapter.  This chapter takes place approximately 30 years previously, and is played from the [spoiler]ticket lady's[/spoiler] point of view.  If you've played the main game, you know how that story is going to end, but it's nice to see how things came about.  On the plus side, we actually have a reusable pocket knife on us during the whole chapter! :snicker:

The devs did such a beautiful job with this game that I have only a single gripe, and it's really a pet peeve.  As a matter of fact, I'm going to put it in spoiler tags just in case y'all didn't notice.
[spoiler]My gripe is this:  The artists chose to use the same color palette for Every. Single. Scene! Meh >_< It doesn't matter if we're inside, outside, underground, or decades in the past, every scene has the same purples and greens. *sigh*  Continuity is of course important, but you can have the same style without using all the same colors!![/spoiler]

Overall, this is an exceptional game in every way, and I thoroughly enjoyed it from start to finish!

31669587.review:
Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood takes several steps forward over the previous game. The visuals are actually great this time – a wonderful mix of green forests and purple shadows in a hand-drawn style. While a few music tracks from the first game are re-used, the rest a newly composed and wonderfully capture the atmosphere. The story did a great job at maintaining my interest; the twist wasn’t hard to predict, though. Voice-acting is average, again. But the return of a refined evidence gathering mechanic, coupled with some fun new puzzle twists and environmental riddles, means the gameplay is excellent. And yes, there is fast-travel, thankfully! 

Recommended. And if you haven’t tried a hidden-object game before, this is one to consider. Though you might never look at ravens the same way again...
Total size on my hard-drive: 900MB
Wallpapers and music tracks from the game are included.

If you’re a parent looking for a game for your children to play, there is major character peril, as well as themes involving life-force being drained from people [spoiler]who are wrapped / trapped in tree roots[/spoiler]. Also some demonic rituals.

31564743.review:
J'avais beaucoup apprécié le 1er Enigmatis  : "Maple Creek", je me suis naturellement précipité sur le 2nd : c'est encore une bonne surprise dans le genre "Objets Cachés". 

Tous les codes classiques de ce type de jeu sont présents mais pour une fois on a un nombre de Scènes d'Objets Cachés plutôt restreints (12 en tout, avec 7 "tableaux" seulement). On penche presque vers le jeu d'aventure Point and Click tant l'effort de mise en scène et les effets sont travaillés. Malgré l'aspect 2D des images, l'impression de profondeur et de mouvement est bien rendu notamment dans les cinématiques. Ce n'est certes pas de la HD mais franchement c'est réussi !

En mode expert, comptez 5-6 heures avec l'histoire "Bonus", n'hésitez pas à cherchez tous les papillons et les illusions pour explorer à fond le soft.

Je dis donc Bravo ! Le bémol est sans doute au niveau de la difficulté... il n'y a que très peu de challenge que se soit dans les mini-jeux, dans les SOC ou dans le cheminement des actions... dommage, dommage... Mais c'est clairement un très beau jeu "casual".

Note : laissez un peu de temps entre les 2 épisodes, même si l'histoire et la réalisation sont bien différentes, beaucoup d'ingrédients sont proches.

30759732.review:
I just finished mastur...enjoying this game, and let me tell you something. I'm a skeptical son of a gun when it comes to hidden object games. My childhood is gone, and I'm done playing a detective or a journalist.  If I were a main character in real life I wouldn't even try to catch the nuthead killer, I'd just chicken out. How many times the main characters in HOGs find themselves in crucial (I'm talking life and death here) situations and they get out of there unharmed as if it were nothing at all? 
This game is a sequel to The Ghosts of Maple Creek, which was alright, but lost to The Mists of Ravenwood. The whole idea of the Ravenwood Park is to lure passersby into some kind of utopia and then eat them and leave nothing but their skeletons. It's creepy enough to find all these crashed cars and all the lost items that belonged to the prey. Some of the actors were actually pretty good at voice acting, surprisingly. Great plot with an unusual gameplay (you find some realism here and there), brilliant locations full of mother nature. The hippies are in the game, too. The ending doesn't feel rushed for once. The detective has to do something important in the end, which doesn't take just one swing or whatsoever. For the first time, the main character has to try harder to get it over with, once and for all. This game is probably one of the best HOGs out there. Hands down.
[spoiler]Also, one of the likable characters actually got killed, which made me feel emotional for their second half in a way. How cool is that?[/spoiler]

Always impressive to rate a game with 98% positive reviews... Nearly makes you wanna give it a negative review just so that some people will read it.
Well, this isn't one of those games that will get a negative review from me. And I won't make much of an effort to write a full-length review for it, I'll just add to the positive reviews.

It's a hidden object game by definition, but most of the time is spent associating objects and solving puzzles. Hidden object scenes only show up from time to time to help you get an extra item to unlock the next puzzle. It's a nice change of pace overall. The story isn't groundbreaking, and I prefer my HO games to be of the non-horror flavor (it seems like 90% of them are horror-themed), well, I'll just say that despite its lack of originality, it's a story you'll enjoy solving overall, because the game doesn't really have any issues. 30222112.review:
Und hier ist er, der Nachfolger von ENIGMATIS - GHOSTS OF MAPLE CREEK, ENIGMATIS 2 THE MISTS OF RAVENWOOD.
ENIGMATIS 2 macht da weiter wo der erste Teil aufhört. 
Unsere Hauptdarstellerin verschlägt es zu einen mysteriösen Park wo sie sogleich von einen riesigen Raben attackiert wird, als sie in einen Wohnmobil ein verängstigtes Mädchen findet.
Wie der Vorgänger ist Enigmatis 2 sehr schön und detailliert gezeichnet, was auch kein Wunder ist, da sich hinter dem Spiel ARTIFEX MUNDI verbirgt. Dieser Publisher ist für seine hochwertigen Wimmelbildspiele bekannt und gewissermassen der Platzhirsch dieser Kategorie.

Das Spiel schafft es spielend eine gruselige und mysteriöse Stimmung gleichermassen aufzubauen und eine spannende Geschichte zu erzählen, die mit einigen Überraschungen aufwartet. Auch hier wirken wie bei Enigmatis 1 Musik, Soundeffekte und Filmsequenzen mit und schaffen es problemlos den Spieler in die Welt von Enigmatis zu entführen.

Auch hier löst man diverse Minirätsel und Wimmelbilder. Diese lassen sich teils leicht, teils schwieriger lösen und sind niemals unfair. 

Fazit: Enigmatis 2 steht seinem Vorgänger in nichts nach und zeigt wie Fortsetzungen sein müssen. Auch wenn der zweite Teil ein wirklich gut durchdachtes und originelles Gebiet zum Erforschen bietet, so gefällt mir der erste Teil dennoch besser, was aber auch an der Atmosphäre des Ortes Maple Creek liegt.
Das ändert aber nichts daran das auch Enigmatis 2 eine gute Empfehlung ist, dem man eine Chance geben sollte.

Danke fürs Lesen. :)

30103003.review:
Эта вторая игра серии Enigmatis. События разворачиваются спустя 2 года после происшествий в Мэйпл Крик.  Девушка детектив продолжает преследовать пастора, из первой части и попадает в новую загадочную ситуацию. На дороге она обнаруживает трейлер и в нём находит маленькую девочку. Появляется огромный ворон и нашей героине приходится отправиться в заброшенный парк, который находится неподалёку.  Если вы не играли в первую часть, то не переживайте – в начале игры кратко расскажут о том, что было в первой части. 
Надо сказать игра очень порадовала, по сравнению с первой частью. (Можете прочитать мой обзор на первую часть).  Игра на отличном уровне, локации очень хорошо прорисованы. Сюжет захватывает с самого начала и не даёт расслабиться до самого конца игры. Музыкальное сопровождение тоже не отстаёт и создает мистическую атмосферу. Головоломки порадовали своей проходимостью, правда, в 2-3 местах пришлось немного попотеть, что бы их пройти. Доска достижения так же осталась в игре, только теперь еще некоторые улики можно совместить с предметами. Наличие в игре нового уровня, поиска парных карточек, порадовало - очень необычно. Также в игре нужно найти все призрачные предметы и бабочек. Для того, что бы заработать все достижения игру нужно пройти два раза. 
После прохождения игры становятся доступны бонусы – обои, музыка, возможность пройти головоломки и т.д. А так же открывается бонусный уровень.
Перевод на русский так же иногда непонятен. Не всегда понятно из-за перевода, что необходимо найти.  
Наличие коллекционных карточек радует.
В целом осталось очень приятное впечатление от игры. Обязательно пройду 3 часть трилогии! Настоятельно рекомендую всем любителям жанра!
Оценка 9/10

30062469.review:
Starting with the 2nd chapter mostly because... that's the one I played first, getting it in a bundle. 

This is probably the most successfully adventure-like game I've played so far. Most every obstacle and minigame is related to your investigation, you actually have to put together evidence and talk to people, and there are even reasons why you lose your items - things happen to you instead of being static.

The heroine is driving around searching the killer Priest she dealt with in the last game. She narrowed down his location to "The West Coast", only to run into Ravenwood Park - just as the park mascot (giant creepy raven) is in the middle of abducting yet another innocent family. Oh, and the Priest from earlier just dropped by to do battle with the park owner for the right to resurrect a demon overlord. Oh, and the mysterious fellow who helped you out in the last game is also there, for no particular reason. Just having the heroes follow the Priest to the park was apparently too much of a stretch (as was giving them some kind of excuse for spending half the game collecting metal discs in order to free the Priest from his jail cell). 

Still though - the plot is head and shoulders above the quality of pretty much every HOG I've played thus far. First HOG to startle and / or scare me on a regular basis. The tree and the raven are genuinely creepy. 
 
The voice-acting is acceptable, [s]Newt[/s] the moppet you have to rescue only occasionally transforms into a dead eyed doll, and some action scenes are pretty good, though [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UrzztaTBHqA]quality is highly variable[/url] even within the same scenes. As long as we're getting sprites + narration, things work. When characters have to move [url=https://youtu.be/eT423uIvWpY?t=13m25s]on screen[/url] things fall apart quickly. (Watch at least the second link)

Edit - the game does insist on you keeping up with the plot and backstory, by periodically returning to certain character who will blah blah at you. I didn't mind, but this game seems to have made my mom quit HOGs, so fair warning.

Heartily recommended.

Anyways, this ended up being quite fustraiting and it kinda ruined it for me... 

If i had to rate this game out of 10, (10 being awesome and 1 being awful) without the achievement sneaky sneaky play our game twice+ sneaky sneaky, then i'd probably rate it 7 and 1/2.

I'd still highly reccomend this, but with a warning to anyone who feels a great need to complete games 100%

29483599.review:
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

[i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] is a 1st person point & click adventure game that contains 'hidden objects' puzzles.

The hidden objects puzzles are just one type of puzzle that appear in the game, though repetitively, and there's no real pixel hunting involved in them. In [i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i], the hidden objects puzzles are improved upon a bit because you don't just need to find items like you did in the first game, but you often need to click on a container to reveal a hidden object or you may need to click on an item to use it on another item in order to produce the hidden object you need. 

If you don't like 'hidden objects' puzzles at all, there's an option to replace them with 'pair-matching' minigames. You know, the memory game that requires you to remember what picture is on the bottom side of some cards, in order to eventually click on two identical cards and remove these from the board. The goal is to remove all the cards from the board. This may sound like a nice addition, an alternative for those who want it, which is basically true but unfortunately, this is also where they messed things up in the Steam Achievements department - more on that below.

There are about an equal amount of other puzzles to be solved, and there's the classic exploration and collecting items to use on other items to further the story, like in other point & click adventure games.

The puzzles in [i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] are clever, challenging and fun. Exploring the park is exciting because of the mysterious atmosphere and because advancing in the game (i.e. getting to parts of the park you couldn't go to before) feels satisfying, like you actually accomplished something through thinking and you feel rewarded for that.

[h1]The story[/h1]

The story is a direct continuation of the story from the previous Enigmatis game, so I recommend you do... 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/284750/

...and play that one first. In part two, our detective is still chasing the mysterious preacher from the first game. She follows his trail to Ravenwood Park, where she'll discover more than she expected, and not just about the preacher.

[h1]The difficulty and length of the game[/h1]

The way to advance in the game, be it through adventuring or through solving puzzles, is always logical so it's never frustratingly hard. Should you find yourself stumped, there's a hint button that you can press. It will point you to the next point where action is required, or allow you to skip a puzzle altogether.

It takes about 7 hours to complete the game. Almost twice that much if you want all the achievements. And a lot more hours if you make one single mistake on your second playthrough to get the remaining achievements. 

[h1]On Steam's extra features[/h1]

[i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] has 6 Steam Trading Cards. You'll get 3 while running the game.

There are 36 Steam Achievements. That's quite a bit more than in the first game. There are more achievements given when you pass certain points in the story. There's also 2 types of 'collectibles' scattered throughout the scenes of the game, which each have 3 achievements tied to them. 

They also added achievements for the pair-matching minigames. Since you can only play [b]either[/b] a hidden object puzzle [b]or[/b] a pair-matching minigame each time, this means that you will need to play through the game twice if you want all the achievements, including the meta-achievement 'collect all the other achievements'. This is a forced way to make it seem like the game has replayability, whereas games like this are completely linear and therefore have no replayability at all. And wait, it gets better! Two things:
[list]
[*] you can't start a new game unless you create a whole new 'profile' in the game
[*] you need to get all the achievements on the same profile in order to trigger the meta-achievement
[/list]
This means that if you forget to click the button to play a pair-matching game instead of a hidden objects puzzle even once, you won't be able to get the achievement for doing all the pair-matching games and therefore the meta-achievement, AND you'll need to play through the entire game anyway because you can't restart the game and you need to stick to the one profile in order to get the meta-achievement. Quite a few people complain about this oversight on the developer's part, and rightly so.

Add to this the fact that the hidden object puzzles have become somewhat more complex, as explained in the 'Gameplay' section above, but the achievement for speed is still 'finish a hidden object puzzle in less than one minute'. If you want this achievement, you'll stress out completely every time there is a hidden object puzzle, until you trigger this achievement and can start to play more casually, which is what games like this should allow you to do. Also, the first hidden object puzzle where you can actually trigger any of the achievements is quite far into the game so practising and restarting the game until you get it right is not as easy as in the previous Enigmatis game. And looking up a guide or a YouTube movie is only partially helpful because the list of items you need to find is randomized every time you start a hidden objects puzzle.

All in all, [i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] is a great game in its genre and a more than worthy successor to the first game, but this is the first game I ever played where the Steam Achievements ruin part of the pleasantness of the experience instead of adding to the fun. If you don't care about achievements or you're not really a completionist, you're good. If you are a completionist, be warned that you'll need to be very attentive and careful what you do, or you'll need to go through the game three or more times just to get those last two achievements.

Od wydarzeń z Maple Creek minęły 2 lata. Bohaterka pierwszej części nie ustaje w polowaniu na Kaznodzieję, który był odpowiedzialny za cały tamtejszy cyrk. Tropy prowadzą ją do Ravenwood – parku / muzeum skrywającego więcej, niż historię okolicy.

Przyznam się, że przez słabą jedynkę nie spodziewałem się wiele po dwójce. Gdy ją uruchamiałem, chciałem ukończyć ten tytuł pro forma. No i przeżyłem miłe zaskoczenie. Sztampową fabułę z Maple Creek ubrano w dodatkowe szczegóły, zgrabnie powiązano z większą całością i podano tak, by gracz miał ochotę na więcej. Naturalnie, sama opowieść będzie kojarzyć się z innymi tytułami, ale jeśli jakiś rzucę, nawiązanie automatycznie zespoiluje przynajmniej jeden wątek Mists.

Oprawa graficzna uległa znacznej poprawie. Różnica jest mniej więcej taka sama, jak między pierwszymi, a drugimi Koszmarami z głębin. Niestety, nie uniknięto kilku mankamentów. W sekwencjach hidden object ponownie można trafić na bardzo niefajnie schowane obiekty, czy nieczytelne obszary. Dla mniej cierpliwych przygotowano alternatywę w postaci prostego memory. Łamigłówki już tak nachalnie nie nawiązują do poprzednich gier, ale uczucia deja vu się nie pozbędziecie. Na plus policzę mapę z systemem szybkiej podróży, dzięki czemu nie trzeba się przeklikiwać przez wszystkie lokacje (a ganiania trochę jest).

O dziwo, aktorsko jest lepiej niż poprzednio, ale muzyka zdaje się na tym cierpieć. Przez pierwszą połowę było dobrze, a potem wręcz zapomniałem, że coś gra w tle. Nie wiem, czy to kwestia powtarzalności utworów, czy coś innego, ale tak bardzo nie zwracałem na nie uwagi, że pewnym momencie czułem się, jakbym grał w ciszy.

Jak już wspominałem, Enigmatis 2 zaskoczył mnie dość pozytywnie. Na tyle, że jestem ciekaw tego, jak potoczy się historia w kolejnej odsłonie. Jeśli przemęczyliście się przez jedynkę, do dwójki zdecydowanie warto zrobić podejście. Uważam, iż zrealizowano ją lepiej pod każdym względem. Moja ocena: 4-.

29183205.review: 我本来是非常喜欢这款游戏的，乌鸦森林系列不管是谜题还是剧情都很棒，我是直接就入手了全套的。于是我认真的把一周目能解锁的成就全都解锁了，兴致勃勃的打算隔天二周目挑战全成就。然后，隔天，我发现我一周目通关的存档消失了，之前解锁的成就也全都没有了，只剩下一个5小时的游戏时长挂在那儿证明我不是在做梦。对于一个普通的休闲玩家，解密速度本来就慢，为了全成就不跳过本身就挺吃力的，本来凭借爱还能撑住，结果BOOM！全没了！！我完全不知道发生了什么，我只知道现在我的心情像吃了翔一样，只想从我的电脑里删掉这款游戏，然后再也不见！见他的鬼的二周目吧！！

29164933.review:
Wow, dès les premières minutes on ressent le changement de style par rapport au premier. Enfin, on plonge direct dans le fantastique en fait, sans nous laisser le temps d'être intrigués par les évènements ou par quoi que ce soit d'autre. En soit ce n'est pas bien grave. L'atmosphère reste lugubre et immersive, même plutôt flippante et malgré tout intriguante. On retrouve les mêmes mini-jeux et énigmes que dans The Ghosts of Mapple Creek, un peu améliorés. Globalement, on a les mêmes ingrédients mais on sent une volonté de tout embellir, que ce soit dans les graphismes ou le gameplay. C'est pas mal, mais je fais partie de la team "c'était mieux avant", et du coup je trouve que le jeu perd un peu de son charme. Et certaines solutions sont un peu tirées par les cheveux... x) 

Ca reste dans tous les cas un point and click très sympa et prenant, encore une fois, j'avais du mal à décrocher une fois commencé. 
Même si je garde une préférence pour le premier jeu, un peu plus mystérieux et énigmatique (merci Sherlock), cette suite reste dans le même esprit et je la recommande évidemment si vous aimez le genre :)

28961675.review:
+ Usual Artifex Mundi quality, amazing graphics and sounds
+ Exciting, cinematic cutscenes
+ Classic HOPA gameplay, very player friendly, optional hints, and 3 difficulty modes

- Way more jumpscares than in any other HOPA game I've played. It feels like they are trying a bit [i]too[/i] hard to make the game exciting. Devs, people don't play HOPA games to have heart attacks, ease up on the thriller factor :)
- The "mysterious helper guy" unexplainably withholds information and useful objects until I get to certain points in the story. (I understand it in terms of game design, but his actions vs motivation doesn't make sense in-world.)
- He also has a very annoying way of speaking. Like... he... pauses after... every... random number of... words...
(Edit: ok the last two points have been somewhat justified by the ending, but still it's an annoying thing to play through)

28917535.review:
Enigmatis 2 non si differenzia molto dal primo, soundtrack che variano leggermente il tema che resta molto simile a quello del precedente capitolo, enigmi più o meno piazzati sempre allo stesso modo ma non sempre uguali tra di loro (gli oggetti da trovare tuttavia rimangono, non che sia una cattiva cosa) e l’interfaccia risulta differente esteticamente. Tecnicamente è migliorato un briciolo rispetto al precedente e c'è maggiore uso della cg. Le cose che cambiano davvero, sono la storia e l’ambientazione che, sebbene Ravenwood sia affascinante, Maple Creek mi è piaciuta di più e credo rimarrà la mia preferita, fino a che Artifex Mundi non sfoderi ambientazioni capaci di stupirmi per davvero. La storia non è male tutto sommato, qui viene svelata molta roba compreso il passato del villain. Ho letto alcuni dire che non c’è bisogno di giocarsi il primo, ebbene, dipende dai punti di vista. Non conoscereste il vero cattivo di questa serie… e sarebbe un peccato. Inoltre, Maple Creek è davvero bella per farsela mancare.
Continuo a trovare la voce della protagonista troppo… finta. Gli altri attori sono buoni, la bambina l’ho adorata.

28839333.review:
[h1]BARDZO UDANA KONTYNUACJA SERII ENIGMATIS[/h1]

Otrzymujemy chyba jedną z najbardziej oczekiwanych gier studia Artifex. Poprzednia część została bardzo pozytywnie przyjęta przez szerokie grono fanów, co ostatecznie sprawiło, że możemy ponownie wcielić się w panią detektyw i kontynuować poszukiwania tajemniczego pastora. 

[h1]OPRAWA GRAFICZNA[/h1]
Ogólnie rzecz biorąc gra jest utrzymana w ciemnej kolorystyce potęgującej tajemniczość wielu miejsc, które przyjdzie nam odwiedzić. Oczywiście znajdziemy również sporo bardzo kolorowych lokacji stanowiących nijaką odskocznię od mroku opowiadanej historii. Jak zawsze studio Artifex wykonało kawał dobrej roboty, ponieważ wszystko jest dopracowane w najmniejszych szczegółach co widać na każdym kroku.

[h1]OPRAWA DŹWIĘKOWA[/h1]
Klimat jest bardzo dobrze zbudowany głównie za pomocą świetnie dobranej ścieżki dźwiękowej. Muzyka jest spokojna, a czasem przeradza się w bardzo tajemniczą co w znacznym stopniu wpływa na odczucia gracza. Można się przy niej spokojnie odprężyć i zagłębić w świat gry.

[h1]FABUŁA[/h1]
Jest to bezpośrednia kontynuacja wydarzeń z części pierwszej jednak tym razem trafiamy do dosyć dziwnego parku o nazwie Ravenwood. Nie znajdziemy w nim zwiedzających, a jedynie natkniemy się na kilku dosyć tajemniczych pracowników. Naszym celem jest rozwiązanie zagadki tego miejsca oraz powstrzymanie złego pastora przed uwolnieniem mrocznej siły, która zagraża ludzkości. 

[h1]ROZGRYWKA[/h1]
Natkniemy się na wiele łamigłówek, których rozwiązanie przybliży nas do odkrycia sekretu parku. Kolejną rzeczą są sceny z ukrytymi obiektami gdzie musimy wykazać się naprawdę dobrą spostrzegawczością. Przemierzając kolejne lokacje zbieramy przedmioty, które musimy następnie wykorzystać w innym miejscu. Jak na tę serię przystało mamy tablicę dowodów gdzie z zebranych informacji musimy wywnioskować co dalej powinniśmy robić. Opcjonalnie możemy szukać znajdziek, które są ukryte w wielu zakamarkach parku.

[h1]PODSUMOWUJĄC[/h1]
Enigmatis 2 to świetna kontynuacja poprzedniczki, opowiadana historia jest bezpośrednio związana  z pierwszą częścią. Znajdziemy tu szczegółowe lokacje oraz sporo łamigłówek, które rzucą nam wyzwanie.

[h1]DLA TYCH, KTÓRZY NIE LUBIĄ CZYTAĆ[/h1]
+ Piękna oprawa graficzna
+ Klimatyczna ścieżka dźwiękowa
+ Wciągająca przygoda
+ Bezpośrednia kontynuacja "jedynki"
+ Znajdźki
+ Łamigłówki oraz sceny z ukrytymi obiektami
+ Sporo osiągnięć

Jeżeli moja recenzja pomogła Ci przy podjęciu decyzji nad zakupem, będę wdzięczny jeśli ją ocenisz/skomentujesz, co jest dla mnie ogromną motywacją do pracy nad kolejnymi tekstami.

28583568.review:
Энигматис 2: Туман Рейвенвуда - весьма качественная (как всегда у Artifex Mundi), мистическая казуалке в жанре "поиска скрытых предметов".

1) [u]Сюжет[/u]: игра поведует нам историю женщины-детектива отправившуюся в погоню за преступным Пастором (из первой части). Но на её пути оказывается авария трейлера случившаяся неподалеку от жуткого заброшенного парка, а в трейлере сем наша героиня обнаружит маленькую испуганную девочку. Попытка помочь девчушке, будет прервана появляением магического ворона, и как следствие наша героиня отправится в парк, чьи темные дорожки откроют ей свои мрачные тайны, раскроют секрет ворона и забытого демона, и сведут в конце нашу героиню со своим врагом. Сюжет в игре прописан довольно интересно и захватывающе, при этом хоть есть отсылки к первой части, можно начинать игру и с этой, ибо сюжет будет раскрыт полностью. Ну а в конце нас ждет традиционная для таких историй: "to be continued...". Так же после полного прохождения, откроется бонусный короткий приквел.

2) [u]Геймплей[/u]: все традиционно для жанра, а также для игр сей кампании. Паззлы в игре не слишком сложные, сцены поиска средней сложности, к тому же их можно заменить на "поиск парного символа". Соотношения паззлов к поиску примерно одинаковое. Ачивки легкие, но чтобы получить все надо пройти игру два раза - с поиском и "парными символами". Также есть возможность найти скрытые "иллюзии" и птичек, на прохождение это сильно не влияет, но дает возможность получить ачивки, а следовательно +1 "идеальную игру". После прохождения будут открыты бонусы в которые входят: концепты, обои, музыка, возможность перепройти паззлы и так далее.

3) [u]Графика и звуки[/u]: картинка в игре прекрасная, есть хорошие видеовставки. Доступна приличная озвучка на английском, а музыка очень хорошо создает мистическую атмосферу.

[u]Как итог[/u]: достойный представитель жанра. Любителям казуалок, поиска скрытых предметов, а также мистических-детективов крайне рекомендую!
10 воронов из 10.

28357069.review:
Recommended.

Since I just finished the first installment in this trilogy, I can say that right from the moment that the game begins, it'll be greater than the first. The plot was interesting because I already knew some things from the previous game and the story continued. For a person who doesn't own the first part, the idea is probably going to be kind of old (save this person, stop the apocalypse and the like) but it'd be still keep you curious.

The graphics are quite nice to look at. It's definitely improvement to the first one. The colors are bright in some areas and dark in others, keeping everything somewhat realistic even with the supernatural elements in the game. People look also more real, not cartoon or manga like, and it truly fits. My only complaint is about the animation. While voice acting is quite good, the characters are quite expressionless in the cut scenes. Even if the character sounds pained, their expressions don't match up. But it's a very minor thing.

A lot of new game elements came to this installment. While you still play as the detective and discover the clues yourself, there's tons of new achievements and morphing objects to find. And butterflies. So you need to be extra observant while playing. It's a nice add.

I enjoyed playing this game. It wasn't frustrating and the visuals are pleasant to look at. Gameplay is normal but there's tons of different things to look out for during the experience. This wasn't my first choice for a hidden object game on Steam, but here I am, giving it a thumps up.

26614589.review: 2013年初次玩乌鸦森林一的时候被吓到感觉非常不可思议，竟然在有很多解密中添加了惊悚元素。如今玩到了二，这个系列在剧情越来越缜密的同时画面也变得越来越精细，传承一代里再加以改良的BGM，深不可测引人入胜之感。唯一感觉不足的地方就是在找东西的时候出现的元素往往出人意料，比如字母或者图案，有点感觉是为了凑数而强加上去的，但不影响大局，总体还是非常棒的。

26512763.review:
エニグマティスシリーズ二作目。

因縁の相手を追いかけていったら、奇妙な事件に巻き込まれてしまった。
事件の解決を目差すと共に、牧師を取り巻くバックストーリーを明らかにしていく、と言うストーリー。

この手の物探しアドベンチャーを35本ほどやってるけど、１、２を争うほど面白かった。
羊たちの沈黙のレクター博士彷彿とさせる趣向が非常に良い感じ。
シリーズ物なので誰にでもお勧めできるわけでは無いけど、たぶんこの手のゲームの中では傑作。
オカルトホラーに抵抗がなければ一作目から続けてやることをお勧めします。

ちなみにシリーズは３で終わりますが、ピークは２だった感じなので、３はお好みで。

26133563.review:
[h1]Worum geht es?[/h1]
Bei Enigmatis 2: Die Nebel von Ravenwood handelt es sich um den Nachfolger von [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/284750/] Enigmatis: Die Seelen von Maple Creek[/url], welcher Grob auf eben diesem Vorgänger aufbaut. Es ist ein Wimmelbildspiel in dem fiktiven Ravenwood Park in welchem man Rätsel und Suchspiele lösen muss.

[h1]Mehr Information:[/h1]
In diesem Abtenteuer muss man das Geheimnis rund um den Park und dessen Besitzer lösen.
Schwächen in diesem Spiel sind eigentlich wieder nur teilweise grobe Übersetzungensfehler bei Suchobjekten im Spiel, anonsten läuft alles relativ rund.
Man kann wieder diverse Spielhilfen an- und abstellen und somit wird diese Art von Spiel wieder jedem gerecht. Von absholutem Nicht-Spieler bis zu fortgeschrittenen Zockern.


[b]Pro[/b]

[list]
[*]schön gezeichnete Park-/Waldlandschaft
[*]Texte auf Deutsch übersetzt
[*]motiviert fortlaufend 
[*]nach dem Durchspielen eine lange Bonusmission welche nochmal fordert
[/list]

[b]Contra[/b]
[list]
[*]in den Wimmelbildszenen wurden Objekte teilweise schlampig bzw. falsch übersetzt was zu Sinnfehlern führt (ein Fächer wurde z.B. als Ventilator übersetzt und so verrücktes Zeug)
[/list]

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Teil 2 der Enigmatis-Reihe kann man wieder ohne lange zu überlegen sofort empfehlen.
Die Rätsel und die Story sind gut und fordern durchweg.

Teil 3 ich kommmmeeeeeeeee!

王道ダークファンタジー、プチドッキリ、ムービー、アイテム探索、カード合わせ、パズル、隠し要素、真相解析、マップデザイン、動く動物たち、すべて良く構成されてます。

25494146.review:
Nie jestem zbyt wielkim fanem gier typu hidden object, ale klucz dostałem w prezencie więc postanowiłem skorzystać z okazji i sprawdzić jak się w to gra. 

Generalnie gra zaskoczyła mnie na plus. Jest całkiem przyzwoicie wykonana pod względem technicznym, grafika może się podobać. Ma nawet całkiem zgrabnie skleconą fabułę, która, choć nie jest zbyt odkrywcza, to zachęca do przejścia gry do końca. Rozgrywka nie sprowadza się to tylko i wyłącznie do bezmyślnego klikania, aby odnaleźć coś na obrazku (choć oczywiście tego typu zagadki występują tu bardzo często), ale gra zawiera również sporo elementów charakterystycznych dla typowych przygodówek point-and-click. Trzeba jednak przyznać, że zagadki są bardzo proste, a potrzebne rzeczy można odnaleźć najczęściej na tym samym, ewentualnie sąsiednim ekranie.
Reasumując: gry raczej bym nie kupił, ale z czystym sumieniem mogę ją polecić dla osób, dla których klasyczne przygodówki są zbyt wymagające czy nudne. W "Enigmatis" gra się lekko łatwo i przyjemnie, a nawet jak komuś zdarzy się utknąć, to gra oferuje bardzo rozbudowany system podpowiedzi.

Moja ocena 6/10 (fani gier Hidden Object mogą doliczyć 2 punkty)

25047473.review:
Detective really needs to wear a helmet every day of her investigative life

This wasn't the game I expected in the mists of ravenwood. The whole "mystical"/"paranormal" element came out super heavily, last game it was relatively subtle (subtle enough to be the delusions of a concussed detective). Giant, giant evil flying thing. Weird creepy shifty stuff. It was still engaging enough. Also I swear this woman has a talent for getting potentially brain damaging injuries - which I might forgive her huge, massive lapse in judgement just for that.

I will point out one thing: I wish the woman from the side story had been the MC for the whole series. Desperate and single-mindedly going after a goal. Much more interesting character. 

Neat Things:
* Pair Matching! Suddely decided the hidden object puzzles are the worst thing in existence (even after buying this game and this series?), well give your eyes a break and match some cards. Honestly it gets old after a while, but it's nice to have the option to change the core puzzle type. Sometimes the hidden object puzzles are too much eye strain. 
* Modifiable objects (ish)! Some objects need other stuff to get it to work. Can't just set it down and put junk on top of it. Nah, don't need to drop it on a rock to replace the batteries. Makes things a little more interesting. 
* Fast Travel! Click on a place on the map and boom! There you are! After the tedium of the first game this was a blessing. 
* Random collectibles! Of two types! Tired of just searching for puzzles, then you can search for butterflies and creepy visions of when the world was beautiful and whole. I thought it was pretty neat. 

Bad Things: 
* The dude. You know who I mean. Not even that concussion can save the detective from my intense scrutiny because c'mon! Major plot hole, in my opinion. Or this detective is really just that concussed. Honestly that trumps every other issue I had with this particular game because I just couldn't fathom how a DETECTIVE could be so dumb. 
* The detective is the herione and not the MC of the side story. I regret deeply. 

Overall, this game was a lot more fun than the first one. There were a bunch of improvements to gameplay to make it more exciting and keep the player engaged in the world outside of puzzles. Aside from the detective being concussed (again. Though this time without the troubling memory loss), it was great.

24926812.review:
I played through this game today and have very little criticism for it. It's an engaging hidden object game which develops the story of the first game in the series into something much more gripping and interesting. I'm really looking forward to the next game.

Drawbacks: As before the bonus adventure is very weak compared to the main game, with some terrible translation into English, and just in general a less gripping story. However, this has improved a lot since the first game. 

Also, you will have to play the main game at least twice through to get all of the achievements, and the game and Steam differ to some degree on counting your achievements. (I believe the game requires you, for example, to find all Illusory Objects and Ethereal Butterflies on a given playthrough, whereas Steam gives you the same achievement even if you find some of them on one playthrough and some on the other. And there were a few achievements I got without being notified, such that I kept trying without realizing they were complete. The second playthrough unfortunately doesn't go *that* much faster than the first. 

I would say that total playtime is about four hours for the first playthrough, an hour for the bonus adventure, and three hours for a "quick" second playthrough to mop up achievements. This may not sound like a ton of game compared to other genres, but it's on par with most hidden object games and presents a reasonably good story.

All in all, if you like the genre or liked the first game in the series, this is a no-brainer.

24804261.review:
Continuing after the adventures in the first game, [i]Enigmatis 2 The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] sees our heroine on the hunt for the evil preacher she encountered before in Maple Creek. This game is a direct continuation of [i]Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek[/i] and I highly recommend you play it first before getting into this one. I played this game for the first time a year ago and am now replaying it as I did with the first in series to prepare for the release of the third title. This game expands upon the mythology of the [i]Enigmatis[/i] world, giving us backstory as well as setting the stage for a grand battle against demonic forces.

You play as the same detective from the first game who, while trying to find the evil preacher, happens upon an abandoned RV. She discovers a little girl named Becky whose parents have disappeared. After Becky herself is kidnapped by a shadowy raven, the detective heads to the nearest place to look for help, a park called Ravenwood. Things quickly get out of control when it is revealed that the park is just a cover for yet another evil servant of the devil who lures people in then kills them by stealing their life force.

I enjoyed the story very much, though it doesn’t have the same gritty feeling as the first game. I personally didn’t like Becky as a character, nor her constant whining about her parents. I know she was scared and was there to heighten the sense of urgency in the game but I didn’t feel attached to her at all and she usually got in the way. It was nice to see Hamilton again, who was helpful to the main character on her mission. Overall, the game seemed like an info dump, throwing out a lot of facts and details about why everything was happening. It both shed light on why the events took place in the first game while also explaining what was happening in this title and setting up things for the third game. 

This game is a hidden object adventure game. It has point and clicks aspects to it as you travel through the park collecting clues and solve mysteries. There are good number of hidden object scenes, you’re given a list of items to find in the scene and some are hidden under other items or require certain actions to find. They’re much more straightforward and less cluttered than in the first game and thus easier to maneuver. Another difference is more puzzles have been added to the sequel, most aren’t too difficult though some require extra though. The evidence board is also back again, letting you feel like a real detective as you go over information you find and piece together theories. The game has a useful map that lets you teleport making it easier to get around and complete tasks.

The graphics and audio are pretty spot-on in the game. The character models and animations are good and show improvement from the first game, namely Hamilton looks a lot better. He also sounds better as I believe his voice actor is different as well. The game has full voice acting and it’s all well done. I personally found Becky annoying but she sounded like a whiny child so maybe I just don’t like whiny children. This a game with a pretty good production value, time and care when into every background and every item in the hidden object scenes.

Play [i]Enigmatis 2 The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] is what this all sums up to, but play [i]Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek[/i] first. This series offers a great continuing story arc with engaging characters and interesting mythos. This game is a collector’s edition and has a bonus chapter, though it mainly just explains more about the Ravenwood park. There are Steam trading cards and achievements but you’ll have to play the game twice to get all of the achievements because three require you to play the option matching game instead of doing the hidden object scenes. For me personally, I do feel like the first game in the series is currently the best, however this is a great successor and a must play for lovers of the genre.


[h1]Usagi’s Rating[/h1]

[list]

[*]A good game to buy.
[*]Only buy if on sale.
[*]Mediocre.
[*]Avoid at all costs.

24561937.review:
The Mists of Ravenwood is the 2nd part of the Enigmatis story line. The main game is a point & click adventure, but combined with 3 types of sub-games. First there are puzzles, which are usually not too difficult to solve. Second there are the hidden object games, where you need to find a list of objects in a single scene. And third, a simple pairing game if you don't like to find the hidden objects.
This is one of the best HOPA (hidden object puzzle adventure) out there on Steam! If you're new to this game genre, give this a try. I found the game addictive as you quickly pass puzzle by puzzle and the story line opens up. Not a must-play game, but quite entertaining. The voice acting can be cheesy at times, but hey, this is casual gaming!
Looking forward to playing the final part of the Enigmatis trilogy!

Score: 8/10

Pro: 
+ nice graphics
+ steady game progress
+ thrilling story
+ additional bonus story

Contra:
- none

24536277.review:
[h1]본 게임은 Hidden Object 게임을 좋아하는 유저라면 꼭 한번은 해봐야 하는 게임이다.
단점은 단 하나 한글화가 안된 점 밖에 없다!![/h1]

심해의 악몽 시리즈 (일명 해적 시리즈, Nightmares from the Deep series), 어둠의 전설 시리즈(Grim Legends series)와 함께 Artifex Mundi 사의 3대 명작중 하나이다. Artifex Mundi 사가 직접 제작한 게임으로 퍼블리셔만 한 게임과는 다르게 여러면에서 최고 클래스의 게임이라고 할수 있다. 예전에는 저연령층의 어린들이 주로 즐기던 게임으로만 치부되었던 Hidden Object 게임이 어느 순간 성인 뿐만 아니라 남녀노소 가볍게 즐길수 있는 게임으로 정착이 되었다. 이제는 하나의 게임 장르가 되어버렸다.

무엇보다 초보자들이 접하기 쉽도록 튜토리얼과 힌트를 제공하는 등 게임의 진입장벽이 낮고 아름다운 그래픽으로 여성 유저들의 호응을 받고 있는 게임 장르이다.
요즘 Hidden Object 게임이 인기를 끌다보니 Artifex Mundi, 8Floor, Big flsh, alawar, G5 (주로 모바일쪽) 같은 게임사들이 서로 경쟁을 하듯 비슷한 게임들을 출시하고 있는 상황이다. 그리고 이들 게임사들이 서로 합의라도 한듯 게임의 패턴이나 인터페이스는 동일한 방식을 취하고 있다. 화면상에서 힌트와 지도, 다이어리(수첩-정보와 퀘스트 기록), 미니게임, 숨은 그림 찾기 등...

그 중에서도 국내 유저들한테 제일 친숙한 게임사가 Artifex Mundi 사라고 할수 있는데, 첫번째로 한글화를 다른 회사들보다 잘 해주는 점이다. Artifex Mundi 사의 게임들의 90% 이상은 한글화가 기본적으로 되어서 출시되고 있다. 물론!! 번역 오류도 인해서 플레이에 불편을 겪는 경우가 생길때도 있지만 한글화를 전혀 안해주는 회사가 많는 현실에서 이것은 정말 고마운 일이다.
다소 번역상의 문제가 있긴해도 전체적으로 게임의 내용을 이해하는데는 문제가 없다.
둘째로 타 게임사의 Hidden Object 게임들보다도 대체적으로 그래픽이 더 뛰어나다. 그래서인지 타 Hidden Object 게임보다 Artifex Mundi 표 게임들을 찾게 되는거같다.

본 게임은 직접 플레이해보면 알겠지만 1회차 플레이하는데 평균 4시간 이상은 소요되는 게임인데 스토리적으로나 게임내의 미니게임이나 숨은 그림찾기 등의 컨텐츠들이 다 괜찮은 수준이다. 그리고 게임 배경에서 별도로 찾아야 하는 것도 있어서 즐길꺼리가 많은 게임이다. 게다가 메인 스토리가 종료되면 서브 스토리도 30~40분 가량 있으니 이것을 하는 재미도 있다. 하지만 아이러니컬하게도 Artifex Mundi 사가 한글화를 잘 해주는 게임사인데 유일하게 본 게임은 모바일버젼은 한글화가 되어있는 반면 PC판 스팀버젼은 한글화가 안되어있다.
어떤 사정으로 한글화가 안된지는 모르겠지만 [u]단점을 뽑자면 비한글화. 그것 밖에 없는 게임이다.[/u]

도전과제도 어려운 수준은 아닌데, 모두 달성할려면 최소 2회차를 기본으로 하고 있다. Artifex Mundi 사에 직접 제작한 게임과 그렇지 않은 게임의 차이가 여러가지 있지만 결정적으로 직접 제작한 게임의 경우 (본 게임도 마찬가지) 기본 2회차를 해야 도전과제를 모두 달성할수 있도록 해놨다. 도전과제 중 숨은그림찾기와 같은 그림 짝맞추기 게임은 한회차에 동시에 달성할수 없는 도전과제라 결국 2회차가 필수적이라고 할수 있다. 다행스럽게도 전문가모드로 클리어하라는 도전과제가 없어서 그건 플레이하는데 편한 점이었다.

본 게임은 명작답게 후속작인 3편이 이미 해외에서는 베타판이 나와있는 상태인데 아마 곧 스팀에도 출시될 것으로 보인다.
게다가 본 게임내에 등장하는 살인마 목사도 아직 살아있기때문에 여주인공인 탐정(수사관)과의 대결은 필연적이고 최후를 맞기 위해서도 후속이 나올 것이다. 권선징악. 악인은 언젠가 응징을 받게 마련이므로...
유저들도 그것을 바라고 있을 것이다.

[h1][b]결론적으로....
Hidden Object 게임을 좋아하는 유저라면 Artifex Mundi 사의 3대 명작 게임인 본 게임을 꼭 한번은 플레이해볼 것으로 추천드리는 바이다. 본 게임은 한글화는 비록 안되있지만 플레이하는데 크게 지장이 없으므로 재밌게 즐길수 있을 것이라 생각한다.[/b][/h1]

62번째 도전과제 100% 달성한 게임.
(2016년 7월 21일 오전 5시 00분에 달성)



평점 90점의 명작 Hidden Object 게임.

[h1]- Review below ----------------------------------------------------------------------[/h1]

Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood is the sequel of Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek. And according to me Enigmatis is one of the best saga of Artifex Mundi. 

As a female detective (FBI or something) you’re on the track of the demonic preacher of Maple Creek who has gone missing since your last investigation. The trail end at the entrance of a very old  and abandoned park where a lot of people have gone missing. You’ll soon discover that the Ravenwood park is not what it seems to be and that something evil lurks beyond. The bonus story let you play the origins of Ravenwood park, years before the detective arrival. 

As every Artifex Mundi game you can move freely in different area (of Ravenwood park) and need to solve some puzzles and find all objects in hidden objects scenes. The game has (2 or more difficulties?) a guest feature: every one of the family can play an independent save and resume the game where they left it. When you first play the game you’ll have a notebook where you have all your objectives as well as all your notes. Adding to that you’ll have a hint button that will help you in many ways but be warned that you may not use it in any puzzle or hidden object scene (HOS)or investigation scene (IS). Hints can be used to know where you need to go, where is the next interaction or to show an object or clue in an HOS or IS or to skip a puzzle. To conclude this part, you’ll also have an inventory to store useful items through your journey.

As some Artifex Mundi game, you’ll have some collectibles to find hidden through the sceneries: some grey butterflies (30) as well as some elusive objects. (about 20 or more) Elusive objects are illusion objects: [spoiler]because Ravenwood in set in a very wide illusion[/spoiler] some objects tend to switch between the real and unreal world.

One of the very good thing of this game is that there are 2 unique features you won’t find in any other Artifex Mundi game:
•	You’ll have a separate inventory for your evidence. You then need to match evidence with the right deduction in order to go further in your investigation.
•	You’ll be able to play a unique memory game whenever you want to skip an hidden objects scene.

The memory is a mix between the game of the same name and the mahjong. Every tiles are shown on their hidden sides and you can only turn 2 tiles at a time which are above the others. To finish the game you must match every joker tiles (with a star on it) in order to skip every object of the hidden object scene. To match tiles you need to have the right cause – consequence or container – content set: like you need to match a pan with a notepad or a bloody knife with a murder.

 (*) : 
In addition to no skip or use any hint while playing every puzzles and Hidden objects scenes, there are more missable achievements. Three of them requires you to complete a puzzle and a hidden objects scene under one minute and the other a matching game within 3 minutes. And 2 others hidden objects achievements ask you to find 3 objects within 3 seconds or to finish a scene with less than 4 misclicks. 
There are also 2 specific achievements: one requires you to watch every cut scene during the first hour of your playthrough and the other one to perform 3 evidence deductions without making a mistake.

The game requires you to find every butterfly and elusive object through the game, so I strongly suggest you to follow the steam guide in order to not miss any one.
Finally if you missed anything while finishing your first playthrough, you’ll need to play the game again with the same profile I guess. (achievements are linked to the profile: you may be able track your achievement in-game I believe) The good thing is you only need to succeed where you failed to get the achievements left.

24061868.review:
[i]Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood[/i] is a fantastic example of why Artifex Mundi is the top developer for hidden object puzzle adventure games.

The graphics and art are beautiful, and the music is fantastic as always. I like that you actually get achievements for collecting the illusive objects and ethereal butterflies, and that you don't have to play the mini-game for achievements. Just as in the first game, I love love love the Evidence feature since it allows the player to have a more active role in the investigation. The one thing I wish was different would be the map. Although there is a fast map, it has area clusters as opposed to each individual area. I much prefer when the map shows all the areas, but this isn't enough to spoil the game.

Even though I called most of the big plot reveals long before the detective figured them out, I still thoroughly enjoyed the story and eagerly await the next installment in the [i]Enigmatis[/i] series. Seriously, it needs to come out already.

23431952.review:
Game Mechanics:
The puzzles and hidden-object-scenes are fairly similar to the first instalment, though this particular part also adds morphing collectibles (a horrible practice, in my opinion, if they are a core gameplay mechanic, but as collectibles I can let it slide).

Plot:
The main antagonist from the first game is back, though he seems to be in a far less domineering position, as another Reaper takes center stage for a while.

Presentation:
The park, both in its dilipidated and pristine state, are well designed and atmospheric. The voice-acting is above average and the music seems to fit the scenes well.

Completion:
Definite yes. It shouldn't take you more than 2 playthroughs, with the first one being the longest.

22512459.review:
After loosing the priest's and Hamilton's trace at Maple Creek two years ago, you found yourself going to Ravenwood. However, a giant raven seems to be interested in you and in the little girl hidden in an trail involved in an accident. When you woke up, everything seems normal but after discovering a prisoner in Ravenwood, you're thrown back to a world of darkness...

Enigmatis 2 is the follow-up of the events in Maple Creek, where you stopped a priest in his way to eternal life. However, Hamilton, the detective investigating his lover's disappearence since 30 years ago, disappeared with the dagger. Now, two years after, you're still searching for them, as you fear that the preacher will not stop and that Hamilton is still out for spilling his blood. However, here, you have to save a little girl and her parents from a terrible fate. A prisoner will help you in your deductions and tell you the story of these disappearances. The plot is well-written and because Ravenwood was released on Steam before Maple Creek, I hadn't any clue about the twists happening later because I didn't have these references. It means that Ravenwood works perfectly as a stand-alone and that you don't need the previous story to understand everything (in reality, in Ravenwood, you'll get the whole picture of the situation). Seeing how the plot ends, it's clear that it's missing a third chapter and I hope to see a sequel one day.

As for the gameplay, it's the standard one: use items, find them, clear hidden objects scenes, solve puzzles. However, in addition of that traditionnal gameplay, you can find for hidden objects scenes two ways to play them: shapes and words. Also, the return of the investigation board is also a nice way to keep being focused on the case and to unlock new objectives. Generally, these deductions will grant you more questions to ask to the prisoner and he will give you also items needed to advance. Finally, Enigmatis 2 doesn't suffer of a problem of navigation, like I had in Maple Creek. You don't have to fear a misclick now.

The graphics are also quite good. I really liked the switch between an illusion world and the reality. Too bad it's only happening once. But you can find leftovers of it thanks to objects changing forms in the scenes. And given the fact that you need to find them for an achievement, it's quite amusing to hunt them down. Another good idea was to make some statues "alive" (eyes moving, head turning, etc...) to strenghten the feeling of being watched, so that you're not at ease at all in this desolation. However, contrary to Maple Creek, which was a town, here, you're in a national park, surrounded by nature and cabins.

The soundtrack is as usual good and the voice acting is perfect. I've nothing to say there.

So in other words, Enigmatis 2 is an excellent casual adventure game, delivered by Artifex Mundi themselves. The game is really worthy of a purchase at full price but Artifex's games are often discounted in the weekly sale or in bundles. If you like their work, you'll love Enigmatis 2.

21697681.review:
Le corbeau est une sale bestiole et le jeu vidéo est là pour nous le rappeler. Pour un Dreamfall, combien de Legacy of master thief ? Qu'il nous surveille seul comme dans les Chaînes de Satinav ou qu'il chasse en nuées pour nous crever les yeux à la Diablo 2, piaf à la plume sombre est plus souvent notre bourreau que la victime du renard. L'ombre ne se dissipe jamais derrière le vol de la peste noire. Les survivants d'Enigmatis 2 en savent quelque chose.

Le deuxième Enigmatis est l'un de mes jeux d'objets cachés favoris. Il n'est ni le meilleur, ni le plus beau, ni le plus intelligent et, s'il avait un corps, il ne sentirait probablement pas très bon. Mais son ambiance l'emporte sur la banalité de son gameplay. J'aime être le visiteur égaré dans une partie de Theme Park qui aurait très mal tourné. Son interface géniale qui simule une enquête policière. Ses relans glauques mais propres, presque aseptisés, comme un tableau un peu effrayant accroché dans le couloir d'un hôpital de jour. Son vert qui se meurt en marron. Sa mythologie qui se dévoile énigme après énigme.

Toutes les qualités des jeux Artifex Mundi sont là - ce qui pourrait faire basculer vos euros sur celui-ci plutôt qu'un autre ? L'intérêt que vous portez à son atmosphère, à ses visuels, à ses saveurs d'enquête macabre inoffensive, à son parfum de jeu de voyage, cette partie de Cluedo que deux enfants jouent à l'arrière de la voiture ou sur les bancs boisés d'une table de pique-nique en bord d'autoroute en faisant semblant d'avoir peur.

21417292.review:
[h1]不思議な森林公園が舞台のポイント・アンド・クリック[/h1]
ヒント機能スキップ機能マップ移動など
基本的な機能が揃っていてオススメできます。
難易度としては中の上ぐらいでしょうか。
ボリュームも十分あります。

面白い試みだなと思ったのは
1画面にあるアイテムのみで謎解きをするシーンです。
ストアページの「足の取れたクマ人形」がある画像がそれです。
P&Cの面白さを凝縮した感じが個人的にお気に入りでした。

また、ストーリー背景に関するアイテムについて
他のゲームではおまけ資料程度にしか扱われませんが
このゲームでは写真や物証をプレイヤー自身で分類して
事件の捜査を進める必要があります。
最悪総当りで何とかなりますが分類するのは子供には難しかったようです。
このシステムのおかげかポイント・アンド・クリックにしては
ストーリーの奥深さを感じられたように思います。

シリーズの続編で前作の登場人物を中心にストーリーが展開されます。
私は1作目をやっていませんでしたが特に違和感なかったので
途中からの人も大丈夫でしょう。

ゲーム内画像も含めて全て日本語化されていて
翻訳の品質も高いです。

20857430.review:
This game is surprisingly good, not just in comparison to other hidden object games, but on its own as a good game. The story is interesting, the voice acting is decent, and most importantly, the puzzles feel engaging and relevant to the story. The character animation is the standard "possessed animatronic robot" level, but you don't have to see too much of it. Secrets and collectible objects hidden here and there really motivate you to keep an eye open for the little details. I was pleasantly surprised by this game. I started playing it as a time killer, but found myself really drawn in to it in a way I hadn't with other games of this genre.

My one complaint is the final achievement which you win "for getting all the other achievements". What it doesn't say is that it isn't referring to Steam achievements, but in-game achievements (which are the same as the Steam achievements). Why does this matter? Because you have to get them all on a single profile. I finished the entire game a second time (on a second profile) and got all achievements only to find I still don't have 100% completion. If you're an achievement collector, be aware of this up front and make sure you get all your achievements on a single profile!

20714179.review:
Samstag, 23.01.2016 - 19 Uhr

2 Metaller sitzen herum und wissen nicht was sie zu tun haben, es wird entschieden die Trash-Liste zu durchsuchen, gefunden wird ein Wimmelbildspiel welches durch G2A Random Keys ergattert wurde. Beide Stimmen der Idee zu.

 - Stunde 1

Logik wird hinterfragt, es werden Witze über die Verhaltensweise der Protagonistin gerissen. Spiel läuft weiter, keiner wendet etwas ein.

 - Stunde 2

Fragwürdige Verhaltensweise nimmt nicht ab, die Flasche Captain wird geöffnet um die Gemüter zu heben. Das Spiel läuft immernoch.

 - Stunde 3

Es kommt langsam vor wie eine Ewigkeit...Schweigen beider Parteien, über Verhaltensweise kann man sich nicht mehr lustig machen, sie wurde Schlimmer.

 - Stunde 4

Fassungslosigkeit das es so lange durchgehalten wurde, steigernd durch die Tatsache das wir nichts besseres zu tun haben. Spaßehalber werden Steamreviews gelesen. Positiv. Ernst. Nicht nachvollziehbar.

 - Stunde 5

Es wird immernoch Gespielt, verzweiflung und Hirnaussetzer zwecks Logik der Protagonistin führen zum eingreifen der Komplett Lösung, wir sind uns einig das wir eindeutig Dumm und Blind sind. Das Ende nähert sich.

 - Stunde 6

Spiel neigt sich dem Ende zu, Gläßer werden immernoch nachgefüllt, langsam wird die Logik gar nicht mehr Hinterfragt, sie wird traurigerweise angenommen. Witze bleiben aus. Dennoch wird weitergespielt.

 --

Anbruch Stunde 7, mittlerweile Sonntag der 24.01.2016 - Spiel beendet. Einstimmig darüber entschieden das nächste Wimmelbildspiel zu Starten. Starten Wahrscheinlich wieder wie bei Stunde 1.

IGN - 9/11 Na Stay Salty.

Easy, good length, casual, Hidden Object game.

Story is interesting and well spread throughout the game. The graphics and sound fit and are ageing well. This is darker and more grim than the usual offerings.
The Hidden Object puzzles are nicely presented scenes, lots to find, not glitchy - there is a little repetition. An alternative match pairs game is also available.
Nearly all the logic puzzles have the answer provided in clues found nearby and all are easy.
There is a map and teleport, the areas are close together so backtracking is not too bad.
Achievements are fairly easy to 100%, but require a second play through.

Discretion advised for crayon-eaters that are easily disturbed.

20528976.review: One of the best HOGs I've played so far. Waiting for the 3rd part! :)

20414700.review:
GOOD!!!

这是我对《乌鸦森林之谜2：鸦林迷雾》的通关第一感受。

同为乌鸦森林之谜系列的2代作品，相对于1代真的是进化了很多。无论是从游戏的内置各种系统、多种游戏玩法、CV的投入感情、还是游戏的难度调整，都可以说是达到了一个非常精准的程度（从我玩过的同类型游戏中而言）。可以说，在此公司的一系列作品中，这游戏在我心目中至少可以进前三。

例常的剧透：[spoiler] 故事剧情紧接着本作第一部的结尾，女主自枫溪镇事件之后，仍在持续追踪着逃走了的牧师。有一次在听闻有地方出现人口失踪案件时，驾车前往的路上正好碰上被绑架的小女孩贝姬一家。于是在保护小女孩并调查事件的过程中，女主了解到整个黑暗仪式的来由以及失踪人口的原因，期间遇上了第一作中的侦探。在得知公园主人是最终BOSS之后，意外得知帮助自己被关押的神秘人物竟然就是苦苦追寻的牧师本人。而牧师和公园主人又是古代十二邪灵之一互相争斗为了他们的恶魔头子复活进行着决斗仪式以便使恶魔附身在自己身上复活的行动缘由。最终女主借助仪式武器成功破坏了公园主人的阴谋，并带着侦探、守门人和贝姬一家逃离了此地。但是结末看到牧师拿到了仪式匕首走向了公园主人，意味着他将会成为恶魔附身的最终宿体……（于是制作组挖了个坑，等第三部填上吧。果然是惯例，我就说没第三部故事能结束？）[/spoiler]

优点：
①精良的画面，丰富的游戏收集系统。
②游戏种类繁多，寻物和配对游戏可以随意切换，区域直达系统省下了流程时间。
③证据系统相对1代便捷了许多，游戏背景和游戏内容让人感觉充实不拖沓。

缺点：
一如既往的中文翻译瑕疵，除此之外确实没有什么太大问题了。

9.0/10.0
适合解密、休闲游戏爱好者
